message: The SDG_INDICATOR field for indicator 3-b-1, translated into all languages

data.en: 3.b.1.Proportion of the population able to obtain essential drugs and vaccines at an affordable cost and in a sustainable manner
data.fr: 3.b.1.Proportion de la population pouvant se procurer les médicaments et vaccins essentiels à un coût abordable et de façon pérenne
